author: daxian-dbw
body:
Fix #2452 
CmsMessage depends on Cert store, so they are not enabled in non-windows. Only Get-PfxCertificate is enabled on non-windows.

comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body:
+@mirichmo to Reviewers.
Note that the product code changes have been checked in SD for quite a while to light up DSC scenarios in NanoServer. This PR moves the code changes to Github and adds more tests.

comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body: @mirichmo I have addressed your comments, can you please take another look?

title: Port CmsMessage cmdlets and Get-PfxCertificate to powershell core
